name: Supra Rosa
body:
### Welcome to my homestead on the digital frontier.

You've arrived at the personal site of binary10 on GitHub. Do it [supra rosa](http://av.vimeo.com/37904/827/135491213.mp4?token2=1407714155_0fb16c168c7b50ab80abaa7b0624e17c&aksessionid=058ec04fa20433e3&ns=4).

***

### BigQuery
Find out more about my (and your and our) repositories using [Google BigQuery](https://bigquery.cloud.google.com/). Learn about how to access the [public GitHub dataset](https://github.com/blog/1112-data-at-github).

```sql
/* Query me */
select 
      actor
    , repository_language
    , count(repository_language) as commits
from githubarchive:github.timeline
where 
    type  = 'PushEvent'
and actor = 'binary10'
group by 
     actor
   , repository_language
;
```

### Common Sense
> "In pioneer days they used oxen for heavy pulling, and when one ox couldn't budge a log, they didn't try to grow a larger ox. We shouldn't be trying for bigger computers, but for more systems of computers." (Grace Hopper)
> "Make fuck, not kill." (George Carlin)
